string-array.name: tutbody_array
string-array.item: "Life is short, and shortly it will end; Death comes quickly and respects no one"
"If a person knows that he will die in a half hour, he certainly will not bother doing trivial, stupid, or, especially, bad things during this half hour."
"Death will come sooner than you expect"
"Remember Man that you are dust and unto dust you shall return"

string-array.name: tuttitle_array
string-array.item: Where Are You Dying Right Now?
Which Type of Body is Dying?
